https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/gWCPFB9l6ztatCe4MGtMB8haUCE.jpg Dona Alzira is an old lady who lives on an old abandoned bridge and survives from her fishing. Gradually she reveals her past and present history while waiting for the future. A Velha e o Mar
